title: Colts-Chiefs Preview Capsule
text:
INDIANAPOLIS (2-2) at KANSAS CITY (4-0)

Sunday, 8:20 p.m. ET, NBC

OPENING LINE _ Chiefs by 10

RECORD VS. SPREAD _ Colts 2-1-1, Chiefs 3-1

SERIES RECORD _ Colts lead 16-10

LAST MEETING _ Chiefs beat Colts 31-13, Jan. 12

LAST WEEK _ Colts lost to Raiders 31-24; Chiefs beat Lions 34-30.

AP PRO32 RANKING _ Colts No. 18, Chiefs No. 2

COLTS OFFENSE _ OVERALL (19), RUSH (7), PASS (25).

COLTS DEFENSE _ OVERALL (16), RUSH (25), PASS (13).

CHIEFS OFFENSE _ OVERALL (2), RUSH (20), PASS (1).

CHIEFS DEFENSE _ OVERALL (30), RUSH (31), PASS (20).

STREAKS, STATS AND NOTES _ Colts have lost two straight in series. … Chiefs’ win over Indianapolis in January was their first home playoff win since Jan. 8, 1994. … Chiefs seeking to start 5-0 for third consecutive season. They have done it five times in franchise history. … Five teams have allowed fewer sacks this season than Indianapolis (six). … Colts have converted 49 percent of third downs, fifth-best in league, and all five fourth-down attempts. … Jacoby Brissett is tied for league lead with 10 TD passes through first four games, most by an Indianapolis QB to start season since Andrew Luck in 2014. … DE Justin Houston will make first trip to Kansas City as visitor after spending first eight NFL seasons with Chiefs. Needs three tackles for loss to reach 100. … Despite missing last two games with concussion, All-Pro LB Darius Leonard has more tackles than all but two players since start of 2018 season. … Adam Vinatieri needs three field-goal attempts to become second player in league history with 700. Morten Andersen had 709. Vinatieri will tie Eugene Daniel for fourth-most games played (198) in franchise history with next appearance. … Chiefs coach Andy Reid needs one win to reach 200 regular-season victories. He has 211 total, sixth-most in NFL history. … Kansas City was unbeaten in October last season and is 11-2 under Reid in the month. … Chiefs have scored 70 points in second quarters of first four games, most in NFL history. … Kansas City has scored at least 26 points in record 22 straight games. … Chiefs QB Patrick Mahomes has thrown for 1,510 yards, third-most through first four weeks of season. … TE Travis Kelce has catches in 83 straight games, tied with Stephone Paige for second-most in Chiefs history. … Fantasy Tip: Mahomes is due for a bounce-back performance after pedestrian (by his standards) game last week in Detroit, where he threw for more than 300 yards but failed to throw a touchdown pass.
